name: @amansheim.bm.net/npmtest
description: Which npm commands run which npm scripts?

scripts.prepare: echo This is PREPARE && dir *.tgz index.js && del *.tgz
scripts.prepack: echo This is PREPACK && dir *.tgz index.js
scripts.postpack: echo This is POSTPACK && dir *.tgz index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo This is PREPUBLISHONLY && dir *.tgz index.js
scripts.prepublish: echo This is PREPUBLISH && dir *.tgz index.js
scripts.publish: echo This is PUBLISH && dir *.tgz index.js
scripts.postpublish: echo This is POSTPUBLISH && dir *.tgz index.js && del *.tgz
